midi.MidiController: A Output MIDI controller, typically a keyboard.
midi.MidiController.aftertouch:
Channel Pressure (After-touch). This message is most often sent by pressing down on the key after it "bottoms out".
This message is different from polyphonic after-touch. Use this message to send the single greatest pressure value (of all the current depressed keys).
midi.MidiController.controlChange:
Control Change. This message is sent when a controller value changes. Controllers include devices such as pedals and levers.
Controller numbers 120-127 are reserved as "Channel Mode Messages".
midi.MidiController.note: Plays a note for the given duration and adds a small pause
midi.MidiController.note|param|key: key to play between 0 and 127, eg: 69
midi.MidiController.pitchBend: Sets the pitch on the channel
midi.MidiController.polyphonicAftertouch: Polyphonic Key Pressure (Aftertouch). This message is most often sent by pressing down on the key after it "bottoms out".
midi.MidiController.programChange: This message sent when the patch number changes.
midi.MidiController.setInstrument: Sets the instrument on this channel
midi.channel: Gets the MIDI controller for a given channel.
midi.frequencyToKey: Maps a frequency to a note key
midi.pitchBend: Applies a pitch bend effect to channel **1**.
midi.pitchBend|param|bend: the amount of bending to be applied on channel **1**, eg: 8192
midi.playDrum: Plays a drum sound on channel **10**
midi.playTone|param|frequency: frequency of the note that will be mapped to a key
midi.setTransport: Sets the transport mechanism to send MIDI commands
midi.toneOff: Turns off a note on channel 1
midi.toneOff|param|frequency: frequency of the note that will be mapped to a key
midi.toneOn: Turns on a note on channel 1
midi.toneOn|param|frequency: frequency of the note that will be mapped to a key
midi.useRawSerial: Send raw MIDI messages via serial
midi.useSerial: Send human readable MIDI messages via serial
